articles.title: CSIRO partners with Google to prototype grid-forming inverters - pv magazine India
articles.description: Scientists from Australia’s national science agency and the electricity research and development arm of Google have developed a new ‘smart’ inverter they claim is almost twice as fast and about 50% more efficient than existing commercial inverters.
articles.content:
From pv magazine Australia
A team of scientists from the CSIRO and Tapestry, a part of Google Xs innovation hub, have prototyped an advanced grid-forming inverter that they say is faster and more re… [+3039 chars]
